choices: You get found by the women
1.content:
Your name was Tim an intrepid explorer famed for his discoveries of rare locations and creatures, you had short brown hair and an average build. You also went everywhere with your beautiful wife/camerawoman Sarah, a stunning raven haired goddess in your eyes with a body any man would kill for. You had been together as the daring couple ever since you first met on an excursion to the frozen wastelands, Sarah was the only person to reply to your request you had sent to the guilds. At first you had your doubts that either of you would make it when you set off but you both managed to survive somehow even through the harshest blizzard in history where you had to share your bodies for warmth in small cramped tent. You also learnt an interesting thing while on that expedition, Sarah seemed to have the most amazing luck, every time something would happen such as a shift in the ice etc she would somehow avoid it. You however didn't have such luck but you did have an incredibly resistant body allowing you to survive things most men would perish from, countless times you've been crushed flat by falling boulders and other heavy objects and always managed to spring back. Ever since that first quest you and Sarah were inseparable travelling the globe, visiting wherever you thought sounded fun and eventually getting married atop the tallest summit in the world.
         It was another glorious day trudging through the deep jungles, a place where very few people even dared talk about let alone visit. Though rumours and legends had never put you or your wife off when the thought of unseen adventure was to be had. "This place is a labyrinth" you smiled back at Sarah whilst hacking through a dense section of foliage with your machete. "Just focus on what your doing, I don't want to have to bandage your hand when you cut off a finger" She said sticking her tongue out at you cutely from behind the camera. "I almost do that once and you never let me forget it" you shrugged "Anyway I think there's a clearing up ahead, lets go check it out" The two of you then dashed over logs and leaves running to a single beam of light filtering through the trees. Upon entering the clearing you rubbed your eyes, one to adjust your vision to the brightness and two in disbelief at what you saw. It appeared as though everything leading further in was getting huge, the trees that were already massive were now giant towers. The leaves on the floors could be used as umbrellas, vines were like thick rope, it was astounding.
         "Woah" the two of you said in unison. "Quick get as much of this on film as you can" prompting Sarah to pick up her camera and document this awe inspiring moment. The two of you then did a quick piece to camera where you showed the size difference between you and the objects close by. "So shall we head further in to the unknown" you said winking at Sarah before falling flat on your face in a hole many times your size. Sarah burst out laughing "Smooth moves there Casanova" Embarrassment hit you but quickly faded as you realised this hole wasn't just any hole, it appeared to be a huge footprint of a person. "What the hell is this thing" you shouted. "It looks like a massive footprint" Sarah said under her breath not wanting to appear stupid for thinking it could really be a footprint. Then all of a sudden the ground began to shake, huge booming noises sounding like footfalls began falling closer and closer to you. Then you saw it eight humongous women of varying hair colour and sizes burst through the small trees behind you, wearing nothing but small fur bras and skimpy thongs completely barefoot. They appeared to be heading right for you. Oh shit you thought this must be a pathway. "Sarah we need to get out of here now, I dont think those women will even notice we're here" You yelled at a despondent Sarah who was transfixed on the rapidly approaching women. You tried everything to get out of the hole but without Sarah's helped it didn't seem possible.
1.title: Beginnings

11.content:
It was to late to escape the hole as the first woman slammed her foot over the top of you crushing you into the dirt. Sarah still in shock stood and watched as the other women followed suit trampling you. In between each of the woman's huge footsteps she saw you lying flattened in various positions before you were covered once more in huge mounds of stinking foot flesh. When the seventh woman reached you you were incapable of even trying to move and simply sobbed as she came crashing down upon you, unfortunately when this woman lifted her foot you were lifted along with her. Apparently the hole you had been stranded in was softened by the trafficking women and now you were nothing but dirt on this travelling giantesses feet. Sarah snapped out of her shock when she saw you had disappeared from the hole and sprinted as fast as her little legs could carry her to chase after you. Try as she might she couldn't keep pace with the giant woman and changed her course jumping on top of the foot of the woman behind her. It was no easy task climbing aboard as she had to time her jump very carefully as to not get caught beneath the foot falls as you had done.
         The eight women seemed to travel miles and miles further into the jungle and Sarah could do nothing but watch helplessly as she saw you crushed repeatedly into the hard floor beneath. Suddenly they stopped moving and Sarah saw a huge swamp with logs jutting out from the water. "Maybe I can get there attention" Sarah thought as the women chatted amongst themselves but before she could even move the ladies burst into a full sprint, she could barely hold on to the giant womans foot as she ran. She then watched in horror as the women began to leap from log to log to cross the swamp, she winced as she saw you slam into the wood only to be grinded and smeared as she leapt to the next one. Once over she noticed the womans feet were very sore looking from all that leaping and she could only imagine the great pain you must of endured from where you were, as strange as it was she was slightly happy that they were back to just walking.
         Another hour passed and the women seemed to have reached there destination, a vast village filled with huts and stone buildings. Huge woman strolled about shopping and entering various stores. "This must be there market place" Sarah thought stunned at the sight of it all, forgetting completely about what was happening to you. The large women then entered a huge stone building.

         What was the building?

Sarah was amazed by the sights that laid before her, a huge stone building filled with deep pools of various bubbling liquids, ranging from thick sticky looking mud to crystal clear waters. All around her she saw naked women laying around on huge tables as other massaged them deeply with oils, there bodies literally glistening thanks to the many skylights that were fitted into the stone ceiling. She was so fascinated by her surrounding she had actually forgot about your current situation as the giant women split up. This soon changed though as she caught a glimpse of you being trampled by the woman heading to a foot massager. She leapt of her ride and darted through the sea of legs that cascaded all around her, luckily she was unharmed and arrived to see you getting smeared into the large sole of your captor who had the most relaxed face as another woman rubbed her feet.
         You had endured an unbelievable torment for your first visit to these lands and things didn't seem to be going your way, as you felt yourself rise off the floor. You saw surroundings for the first time instead of just floor, and was shocked to see a giant amazon woman staring right at you. You screamed fearing the worse but she didn't even acknowledge you, instead she dipped her hands into a slimy substance before rubbing it into you. That's when it dawned on you "She hasn't seen me at all, she's just massaging her feet" You thought as you were smeared all about this giant sole. The strange substance was not the most pleasant of odours but it was slightly better than the sweaty dirty sole had been moments before, it also had the added bonus of loosening your bonds. You were now freely being pushed about by this giant hand as it dragged you up in between the woman's toes. You winced as your face was slammed into a rather nasty deposit of something that had been building up in between her toes, the stench and taste of it making you retch as you were left lying in it.
         Sarah had tried to get these woman to notice her many times during your massage but nothing she tried seemed to work. "I must be to quiet for them to hear in this busy place" She thought while scheming of a way to free you. Unfortunately she was to late as the woman was once again standing up once more, her giant foot slamming directly in front of her. Thats when she got her next glance at you, crushed up like a ball between her middle toes, stuck tight by a disgusting looking piece of toe jam and a pungent oil. Sarah quickly leapt onto the foot as it began to travel once more. She then attempted to free you by shimmying down to her toes and propping herself across them. She reached in her arm painfully being pinched by the giant toes each time the giant woman slammed her foot on the floor, she finally grabbed hold of something and pulled with all her might. Unlucky for her it was nothing but a branch that had been caught in the toe jam as they had trecked the jungles. "Why can things never go easy" She sighed as she reached in once more.

Does Sarah succeed?

Each time instead getting smacked by the various items your wife had grabbed instead. You then felt her giant foot slam down, and attempted to crawl to the surface, sliding slowly through the sludge. Success you break free, inhaling deeply of the fresh air, completely oblivious to the large square of fabric that was heading towards you. You could only let a a small squeak as it slammed into you roughly scraping you back into the stinking abyss. If the massage was bad this was 100 times worse the roughness of her scrubbing leaving you screaming in all of her filth. You were scrubbed into every nook and cranny of each foot. Every toe, pad, ball and spaces in between was now what you were enduring. She then began scrubbing her feet with vigour. "Got to make sure I'm thorough this time, my feet get pretty filthy from those treks to find other people" with that she began flossing her toes with the cloth making sure to get in between every last digit. When she finished she gave a glance at the towel "Hahahaha wow its pretty filthy, these sweat rags really do take a beating from us, well best hang it up for my sisters to use" She giggled hanging the smelly fabric back on the wall.

12.content:
You stare at the approaching giants as their footsteps inch closer and closer to you. You cringe in fear as the huge feet approach the hole with their filthy stench already assaulting your nostrils. All of a sudden you heard Sarah yell "Tim quick grab my hand!" Without a second to lose you jumped at Sarah's outstretched palm and gripped it tight. Sarah heaved as your feet kicked. As you crawl out of the hole a split second goes by then the foot of the Amazon comes crashing down into the empty footprint sending you and Sarah flying several feet into the jungle concealing your presence. You and Sarah lay low as you watch all of the colossal women stampede through the jungle creating more giant footprints. Once they're gone you and Sarah emerge from the jungle, survey your surroundings, and continue with your journey on an alternate route.

"That was too close back there." Sarah said relieved. "I know I thought for sure I was going to end up stuck to the bottom of their smelly feet." You said. "Thank goodness I snapped back just in time. Pity though you'd look so cute as a tattoo ha ha ha!" Sarah said obviously kidding, you however didn't laugh finding it not so funny.

You two kept walking until arriving at a huge mountain. "Oh you've got to be kidding me!" You shout in a fit of rage. "Calm do we'll just climb it." Sarah said trying to calm you down. "We can't our gear is a mile back at camp." You retort. "Well can we just go around?" Sarah said becoming irritated. "It's pretty long, maybe?" You said thinking. "Alright how's this? I'll go back and get the stuff, while you run along the side looking for a way around, sound good?" Sarah said. "I guess." You said half heartedly not wanting to be left alone. "It'll be fine. I'll be back before you know it." Sarah said warmly as she kissed you and ran back into the jungle. You watch as she disappears, then you focus on the path ahead of you.

What happens next?

13.content:
You could just feel them getting closer and louder with every step. The shock waves created from the massive feet started becoming harder. "Sarah! Snap out of it, damn it!" She just wouldn't snap out of her trance induced by the titanic girls. "How can those giants notice me. I look ant sized compared to them! This foot hole is bigger than me and it was probably created by them. I'm gonna die in this footprint that reeks of sweat!" The giants now tower above you and Sarah. One of their feet slam down next to you. This impact snaps her out of it and she let's out a little scream. You had your eyes closed, waiting for the giantess's foot to stomp you into dirt, but it never happened. You open your eyes again to see them bend over slightly, looking down at you.

"It long time since last tiny found this place." One says in a primitive, unintelligent sounding voice. "We lucky, others could have found him, or we could have stomped him." The other giggles, looking over to where Sarah was standing. "Look! Another one!" You see one pick Sarah up. The other two examine her carefully. "...Wait. This no weak, tiny, man. This fellow woman!" One shakes her head. "Impossible. Too tiny. Woman big and strong. She small and weak." The one is the center looks at you again. "This one man. No question." She smirks as she pulls you out of the hole and dangles you by your shirt. You were too terrified to speak. "We have to bring them before queen." One laughs. "No! These toys! Keep for ourselves." The one holding you speaks out. "It is law. We cannot disrespect sisters." The one who had you quickly snatches Sarah. "You will be transported to village. Into palace. Meet Queen."

The amazonian quickly brings you both around to her back. Holding you above her rather nicely shaped ass. "Will be held in butt, like all tinies." Sarah speaks out. "Wait! Can you not carry us?" The one who previously held Sarah laughs. "Tradition, clueless tiny." The one holding you both nods. "Right. You listen to superiors, tiny." Sarah interrupts the attempt to imprison you both. "But I'm a woman. Surely it'd be wrong to do this to a 'sister'?" They look at each other a bit. "She looks like sister, sound like sister..." Sarah speaks again as they think. "I would also like to request that my assistant not be treated in such a manner." It was a bit annoying to be called the assistant, but probably best to get on their good side. "I think tiny man belongs to tiny woman." "Maybe she decide what to do?" "Woman does have total right to slave."

She holds you both to her face again. Staring at you both. "Tiny woman fine. Man goes in booty." She says. "Or we crush!" Says one from behind. "I'm sorry, Tim." She says to you with no time to respond because you are already being pushed into the fur thong. You could feel the cave woman's slimy crack as you slid into her underwear. She was obviously all sweaty from the tropical weather. And the stench gave you the hint they didn't care much for bathing. You could hear her voice from outside. "Have much gas for you, little man." You didn't want to know what that meant, but you were gonna find out as she pulls the thong tightly against her. A rumbling started in her bowels, and a massive burst of air. You were enveloped in the stench of the worst fart ever created.

...And it went on like this the entire trek. You were forced to drown in butt sweat, smelling the worst scents ever created in the universe. Seeing her dirty anus pulse furiously, as if trying to grab your head and pull you in. Her ginormous, yet well toned cheeks beat you as she took steps. You could hear laughing and conversation. Especially laughing after cutting a ripe fart on you. You were probably passed out for most of the trip.

Finally you were able to be released. When you did you saw the home of their queen. It was walled of from the rest of the civilization, like a castle. Heavily guarded by fierce looking warrior women. You saw the most beautiful gardens and in front of the door to the house was a statue of a beautiful woman, with the most amazing ass ever seen. "Stay at attention! Show queen all of respect!" You quickly regain your composure, not wanting them angered. You see Sarah riding on the shoulder of one. She waves at you.

The inside was a huge dining hall, with chandeliers of sorts hanging above. The room looks like a mess. The table was messy with food and other things on it that needed cleaned. Mostly the whole room was covered in food scraps. "Don't really clean up after themselves..." You think to yourself. "Can I talk to him?" The giantess looks at you. "Very well." She hands her to your captor, leaving you both in her grip. "I learned so much about these people!" She starts. She goes off on a long lecture about the isolated people of this land. They didn't know anywhere beyond here because they were convinced there was no way out. So they are curious whenever tinies find their way into their land. They also glorify the female gender. Females are the masters of everything. All life is inferior to human females. They also focus mainly on the glorifying a female's butt, and the pure stench of their bodies. They do not bathe as it is considered degrading to their natural beauty. Their queens are revered as demi gods. Daughters of the almighty goddess sent down to the Earth to send her message and govern womankind. They know this by who has the best ass in the tribe, and the foulest body odor to go along with it. Sweating was something all woman try to do. They believe they are ridding themselves of ugliness when they sweat as it "enhances" their stench and their bodies glisten with it. All other life... when interacting with other species they are treated as slaves. Only to serve a woman and her perfect behind. Tinies are their favorite. For kind of obvious reasons.

You go past the dining hall to find the throne. A typical gold throne up a couple of stairs. On top is the most beautiful woman you have ever seen. She wore much jewelry. They bow before her, and push you onto the floor. You assumed you both must bow as well, so you do.

"Well then, what have you brought before me." She asks, in a sexy, more sophisticated voice. "We found tiny! Two! We think one might be female." The queen raises an eyebrow, and walks up to approach you two. She was easily the tallest human in the world. However that was not the most catching detail. Her feet REEKED. You could smell it before they even lay in front of you. You and Sarah can't take it as you begin coughing and gagging. Her laughter booms above you. "Take it in. Inhale the scent of a true woman." She picks you up and looks at you. "Well you are certainly a woman..." She says, looking at Sarah. "We didn't know tiny women existed." She looks at you. "You are just another tiny. Meant to be a cushion and sweat rag, but my real problem is what to do with you, tiny sister." She turns back to Sarah. "Usually my verdicts on tinies are swift, but you complicate things a bit." She stares at you both a good while. Obviously having much internal conflict. She closes her eyes and raises her head, as if trying to a contact a deity or something.

After a painfully long period of waiting....

Sarah feeling this situation was turning ugly for you tried to speak up in your defence but her voice fell on deaf ears, as the queen continued on with her verdict. âDue to the fact we do not harm fellow sisters I shall hand her over to the medicine woman in hopes she can be cured, the tiny shall also be handed over to her to assist her recovery.â

         You couldnât believe it this sounded like the perfect scenario for you both as the medicine woman was unlikely to crush you or Sarah when she needed you both. Snowdrop raised her foot and placed it over the top of you grinding your face between her toes, the smell was ungodly her pungent foot rubbing years of barefoot walking and sweat into your mouth and nose. âYou worry to much about these creatures little sister, you must remember they are only here to serve usâ grinding you harder into the floor to emphasise her point. Sarah was pained with a massive feeling of guilt seeing the man she love reduced to nothing but a play thing for this giant woman's foot but didn't want to show her true feelings for you to these women as she knew it would only make things worse for you. âYou are probably right about that big sister but I only was only asking how he shall make it to the hut with us?â Snowdrop stopped her grinding and lifted her foot off you allowing you to finally breathe something other than foot stink, as well as coughing up dirt and toe jam that was thrust in your mouth. âIt is simple, he shall walk thereâ

         Youâre eyes went wide hearing this and began yelling at the huge woman in front of you âHow the hell am I meant to make it to your hut? Iâd probably be crushed or tortured by the other women on the way thereâ Snowdrop laughed stomping down hard on you once, crushing you into the floor. âThat is not my issue tiny, it is your job to make itâ laughing even harder as she spoke âOh and as an incentive to make it there, if you fail to make it to my hut by nightfall I shall have you punished by the royal guards for not following the queens rulingâ Snowdrop then quickly turned away laughing loudly as she left, Sarah on her shoulder looking back at you her eyes tearing up from what she just witnessed.

Rules
1. Mainly a butt and fart story (boobs and feet allowed, but prefer ass and farts)
2. No other males (except the main character).
3. Read what was written before you if you are making an addition to the story so it will make sense.
4. All characters are aged between 18 and 40
5. Huge fan of unaware giantess
6. No graphic breaking of limbs/death etc
7. Sarah normally doesn't get crushed but instead tries to help Tim when he does from the giantess
6. Have fun!
